# Gapminder data

```{r}
library(gapminder)

data(gapminder)
head(gapminder)
```

# Animation with ggplotly

```{r}
library("ggplot2")
library("plotly")

gg <- ggplot(gapminder, aes(gdpPercap, lifeExp, color = continent)) +
    geom_point(aes( size = pop,
                    frame = year,
                    ids = country,
                    alpha = 0.3)) + 
    scale_x_log10(labels = scales::dollar_format())

ggplotly(gg)
```
